verses.text: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, how \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w mine|strong="H6440"\w* adversaries increased! Many \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* rise \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* say \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6965"\w* \w help|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w But|strong="H7227"\w* thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, art \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield about \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w My|strong="H5315"\w* glory, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3444"\w* lifter up \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answereth \w me|strong="H1157"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy hill. \qs Selah\qs*

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* laid \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* slept; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* awoke; \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* sustaineth \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H3068"\w* ten thousands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5564"\w* themselves \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w round|strong="H7901"\w* about.

Arise, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w thou|strong="H3372"\w* hast smitten \w all|strong="H5439"\w* mine enemies \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cheek bone; \w Thou|strong="H3372"\w* hast broken \w the|strong="H5921"\w* teeth \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked.

\w Salvation|strong="H3467"\w* belongeth \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Thy|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H6965"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
